description: File sync and management tools for Claude Code development
config.claudePath: Path to Claude Code CLI executable
config.autoRefreshSpecs: Automatically refresh specs when requirements are saved
welcome.overview:
Configure Prisma for Claude Code

[$(gear) Open Settings](command:prisma.settings.open)
[$(question) Help](command:prisma.help.open)
welcome.specs:
Build complex features with structured planning

[$(plus) Create New Spec](command:prisma.spec.create)

[$(sparkle) Create New Spec With Agents](command:prisma.spec.createWithAgents)
welcome.hooks: Automate repetitive tasks with smart triggers
welcome.mcp:
Connect to external tools and services
Use 'claude mcp add' to configure servers
config.claude.invocationMode.description: Choose how to invoke Claude Code
config.claude.cliPath.description: Path to Claude Code CLI executable (default: claude)
